New Records: Australia chased 209, their second highest successful run-chase in T20 international and their highest chase against India in T20Is.
India's 208 was their highest score against Australia in T20 international.
India's 208 was their seventh highest score at their home venue in T20 international and their second highest total at Mohali in T20Is.
Hardik Pandya hammered a 25-ball fastest fifty for India in T20 international and the joint second fastest fifty by an Indian batsman against Australia in T20Is.
68: KL Rahul and Suryakumar Yadav set up the third highest third-wicket partnership for India against Australia in T20 Internationals.
70: Cameron Green and Steve Smith set up the record second-wicket partnership for Australia against India in T20 international.
Cameron Green hammered a 26-ball second fastest fifty by an Australian batsman against India in T20Is.
India's 13-sixes was their joint fourth most sixes in an innings in T20 international and their joint most sixes in an innings against Australia in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Nathan Ellis and Josh Hazlewood's combined 5-wickets.
Cameron Green named Player of the match for his 61-runs off 30-balls.
